28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Five kinds of animals are harmful and could be killed in the Haram (Sanctuary). These are: the crow, the kite, the scorpion, the mouse and the rabid dog

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقْتُلُ الْمُحْرِمُ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ
chapter.eng-name: (What kind of) animals can be killed by a Muhrim
